definition[0]: a round pipe made of metal, glass, rubber etc, especially for liquids or gases to go through
definition[1]: a long hollow object that is usually round
definition[2]: a narrow container made of plastic or soft metal and closed at one end, that you press between your fingers in order to push out the soft substance that is inside
definition[3]: a tube-shaped part inside your body
definition[4]: the part of a television that produces the picture on the screen
definition[5]: to float on a river on a large inner tube for fun
